user.About: Hello, I'm Vivek. An undergraduate computer science student from india. From my passion I love to build new things and I always try to implement my creativity in my projects and all of my creations. I love to learn about new technologies like Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Deep Learning and TensorFlow or PyTorch etc. Also since , from childhood exploring the universe and cosmos and knowing even more about my world makes me even more alive. And besides of this I am also quite good at frontend technologies like React.Js and Figma etc.

RandomAboutText: Things I have Built (I am still working on them -_-)

Things like 'Completed Projects' doesn't exsist in my life as I got an idea about a project and I start working on them. There's always something there which I find that can be improved. So every project is ongoing.
